message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60, you take 40. We can negotiate further if you want.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice.  I'm proposing a more balanced split this time.  Let's avoid letting inflation eat away at our potential gains.
I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to move forward, considering the inflation.  Let's not risk losing more money with further negotiation.
